title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 7 - Purchase Orders, Purchase Contracts, Miscellaneous Service Contracts And Purchase Orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 7 - Purchase Orders, Purchase Contracts, Miscellaneous Service Contracts And Purchase Orders

State Regulations
§ 7.1 - Bids
§ 7.2 - Contracts, prior approval by comptroller
§ 7.3 - Award of contracts; purchases under bids
§ 7.4 - Purchase orders on approved contracts
§ 7.5 - Pre-audit by comptroller
§ 7.6 - Items manufactured by correctional institutions
§ 7.7 - Purchase orders involving labor and service contracts
§ 7.8 - Purchase order
§ 7.9 - Contents of purchase orders
§ 7.10 - Comptroller's approval of purchase orders
§ 7.11 - Revision or cancellation of purchase orders
§ 7.12 - Orders shall be to specific dealers
§ 7.13 - Availability of funds
§ 7.14 - Equipment acquisitions
§ 7.15 - Exemptions from the requirements of article 4-c of the economic development law
§ 7.16 to 7.19 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 7

Statutory authority: Economic Development Law, § 1 44[2]; State Constitution, art. V, § 1; State Finance Law, §§ 8[14], 112, 167-a[1]
[FN*] Resolution filed March 5, 1962 was not published in the

Official Compilation. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
